title: Supreme Court Takes Up Challenge to Social Media Platforms’ Shield
description: The family of a student killed in terrorist attacks challenged a 1996 law that gives websites immunity for suits based on their users’ posts.

title: U.S. Said to Plan New Limits on China’s A.I. and Supercomputing Firms
description: The new rules could be the most sweeping action taken yet by the Biden administration to thwart China’s access to American technology that powers data centers and supercomputers.

title: Will Smith Film ‘Emancipation’ Will Be Released in December
description: Apple said the movie, Mr. Smith’s first since his infamous slap at the Oscars, will be in theaters on Dec. 2 and begin streaming on Dec. 9.

title: Silicon Valley County Battles With Uber Over Reporting of Sexual Assault
description: Uber does not inform the police of such incidents, citing advocacy group guidelines. But officials in Santa Clara County argue that it should.

title: How a Tiny Elections Company Became a Conspiracy Theory Target
description: Election deniers catapulted a Michigan firm with just 21 U.S. employees to the center of unfounded voter fraud claims, exposing it to vicious threats.
